short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CRM CTI for Heritage Telecom Customers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app connects your business phone system to CRM tools including Salesforce and Zoho. Other features include click to call, screen pops, directory integration, and single sign on. 

You will now be able to use click to dial in any popular CRM and the calls will flow through your business phone system.
